root.name: Dynamite Jack
root.description: OverviewYou play as Jack, a space marine who is captured and put to work in the Anathema Mines. With only a flashlight and an unlimited supply of bombs, you must evade your captors and fight your way to freedom. A map editor to create your own levels is included.System RequirementsPCOS: Windows XPProcessor: 2 GhzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 256 MBDirectXÂ®: 8.0Hard Drive: 100 MB HD spaceMacOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: 2 Ghz Intel processorMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 256 MBHard Drive: 100 MB HD spaceLinuxOS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, Mint 13 LTS, Fedora 16Processor: 2 GhzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 256 MBHard Drive: 100 MB HD space
